A Message to Teachers and Parents -

I give our teachers so much credit and praise for the eLearning work and yet, you, our parents are to be thanked, too. We have experienced a true learning curve. Amid all that is going on in your professional and personal lives, you are being asked, if not forced, to help play the role of teacher, too. (If you didn’t fully appreciate the work of a teacher heretofore, I suspect and hope that you do now.) This is no easy assignment and task. We are truly a village. Your patience, your partnership, and your perseverance are to be commended. We are fulfilling, I believe, our call for cooperative and collaborative problem-solving. Your kids are very special to us. Each of us is always growing! As the days draw on, keep the kids moving forward. I thank you! Happy Easter !

Warm regards,
Will Morton, Principal
April 8, 2020

John Glenn High School was happy to receive a total of 38 awards from the Scholastic fine arts competition! Students worked hard creating original projects in various medias.
